Trigger.name: Made meld/added room
Trigger.script: if not meld.center then meld.rs[gmcp.Room.Info.num] = true meld.center = gmcp.Room.Info.num meld.paint() else meld.rs[gmcp.Room.Info.num] = true meld.calculate_spots() meld.paint() end

regexCodeList.string: You crouch low and release a raucous, terrifying cry that echoes through the air about you, the shadows about you whispering names of power and binding. A terrible mauve light twists across the ground and you become one with the land.
You bend down and trace trails in the water with your fingers. The waters sparkle with flecks of azure light and you feel this location meld into part of your spirit.
You sweep the air with your hand, allowing your spirit to merge with the clouds around you, becoming one with the location.
This room is already melded into your demesne.
You clap your hands and allow yourself to merge with the burning heat around you.

Trigger.name: Broke myself
Trigger.script: if multimatches[2][2] == mm.me.name then meld.rs[gmcp.Room.Info.num] = nil meld.calculate_spots() meld.paint() end
